{"id":914930394,"question_id":2,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 3 months","timestamp":1678788653,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/914930394/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"42.3 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * public class ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode next;\n *     ListNode() {}\n *     ListNode(int val) { this.val = val; }\n *     ListNode(int val, ListNode next) { this.val = val; this.next = next; }\n * }\n */\nclass Solution {\n    public ListNode addTwoNumbers(ListNode l1, ListNode l2) {\n        // ListNode r1 = reverse(l1);\n        // ListNode r2 = reverse(l2);\n        \n        ListNode r1 =l1, r2=l2;\n        \n        \n        ListNode dummy = new ListNode();\n        ListNode curr = dummy;\n        \n        int carry = 0;\n        while(r1!=null || r2!=null || carry==1){\n\n            int val =  carry;\n            if(r1!=null){\n                val+=r1.val;\n                r1=r1.next;\n            }\n            \n            if(r2!=null){\n                val+=r2.val;\n                r2=r2.next;\n            }\n            \n            carry = val/10;\n            val = val%10;\n            \n            ListNode node = new ListNode(val);\n            curr.next = node; \n            curr=curr.next;\n        }\n        \n        return dummy.next;\n        \n        \n    }\n    \n    private ListNode reverse(ListNode head){\n        ListNode prev= null;\n        \n        while(head!=null){\n            \n            ListNode next = head.next;\n            head.next=prev;\n            prev=head;\n            head= next;\n        }\n        \n        return prev;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
